messages.message:
Quick thing - positive:

Doing ai hub mobile is absolutely killing it at a conference!! See screenshots. 

The annoying thing is that I get automatically logged out very quickly, and each time have to go through an elaborate Okta log in again. Standing there for 4-5 minutes with a live customer trying to log in is not a great experience. Is there anything we can do about that?
It is super powerful showin mg the product live directly from the phone
i would ask in <#C0106JV0TFS|> or email IT about the automatic Okta logout

Maybe we can create an app - that presumably wouldn’t have that issue. But overall, I just want to call out @Travis as this mobile experience has been a phenomenal tool at Insurtech Connect Las Vegas!
Glad to hear it @Bas ! I haven’t heard of the logout issue though.
To Serena’s point probably more an okta issue
Great to hear that Converse mobile is helping out at the conference! We see similar response in India events. Massive kudos to @Liam Callanan @Subash and @Travis for their work on this!
